languages.text: Загадочная болезнь охватила клан, проживающий в отсеке одной из макропушек. Зараза стремительно распространялась, заставляя заболевших корчиться от невыносимой боли в животе и испускать дух после пары суток агонии. Прежде чем офицеры успели отреагировать, соседние кланы взяли решение проблемы в свои руки и заполнили отсек угарным газом. Макропушка введена обратно в строй через несколько дней, самоуправцы получили законное воздаяние за линчевание слуг Вольного Торговца.

A mysterious sickness struck the clan living in one of the macro-cannon chambers. The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighbouring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.
languages.original_text: Загадочная болезнь охватила клан, проживающий в отсеке одной из макропушек. Зараза стремительно распространялась, заставляя заболевших корчиться от невыносимой боли в животе и испускать дух после пары суток агонии. traits.locale_text: A mysterious sickness truck the clan living in one of the macrocannon chambers. The pox quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighboring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macrocannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.

The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.

languages.text: 某种神秘的疾病袭击了宏炮区域的某支氏族。这种疾病迅速蔓延，患者被极其痛苦的胃痉挛折磨得死去活来，并在几天之后死亡。赶在军官做出反应前，邻近的氏族就自行采取了行动，把被感染的舱室内灌满了一氧化碳。在这之后，宏炮被重新投入使用，而这群自作主张的义警则由于对行商浪人的仆人施以私刑而遭到惩罚。
languages.original_text: A mysterious sickness struck the clan living in one of the macro-cannon chambers. The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighbouring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.

traits.locale_text: 某种神秘的疾病袭击了宏炮区域的某支氏族。这种疾病迅速蔓延，患者被极其痛苦的胃痉挛折磨得死去活来，并在几天之后死亡。赶在军官做出反应前，邻近的氏族就自行采取了行动，把被感染的舱室内灌满了一氧化碳。在这之后，宏炮被重新投入使用，而这群自作主张的义警则由于对行商浪人的仆人施以私刑而遭到惩罚。

languages.text: Una misteriosa enfermedad afectó al clan que vivía en una de las cámaras del macrocañón. La enfermedad se propagó rápidamente, provocando que los enfermos se retorcieran con insoportables retortijones y fallecieran tras varios días de agonía. Antes de que los oficiales pudieran reaccionar, los clanes vecinos tomaron cartas en el asunto e inundaron la cámara con monóxido de carbono. El macrocañón se puso de nuevo en funcionamiento y los vigilantes fueron castigados por someter a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente a la justicia popular.
languages.original_text: A mysterious sickness struck the clan living in one of the macro-cannon chambers. The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighbouring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.

traits.locale_text: Una misteriosa enfermedad afectó al clan que vivía en una de las cámaras del macrocañón. La enfermedad se propagó rápidamente, provocando que los enfermos se retorcieran con insoportables retortijones y fallecieran tras varios días de agonía. Antes de que los oficiales pudieran reaccionar, los clanes vecinos tomaron cartas en el asunto e inundaron la cámara con monóxido de carbono. El macrocañón se puso de nuevo en funcionamiento y los vigilantes fueron castigados por someter a los sirvientes {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente a la justicia popular.

languages.text: 謎の病がマクロキャノン室のひとつに住む一族を襲った。この病はあっという間に広まって、病人は耐え難いほどの激しい腹痛に悶え、数日間苦しんだ後に事切れてしまう。士官が動き出す前に、近隣一族が問題に自分達で対応して、一酸化炭素を空間に充満させた。マクロキャノンは仕事に戻されて、私的に行動した者達は、自由開拓者の従者を暴民の正義に晒したとして罰せられた。
languages.original_text: A mysterious sickness struck the clan living in one of the macro-cannon chambers. The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighbouring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.

traits.locale_text: 謎の病がマクロキャノン室のひとつに住む一族を襲った。この病はあっという間に広まって、病人は耐え難いほどの激しい腹痛に悶え、数日間苦しんだ後に事切れてしまう。士官が動き出す前に、近隣一族が問題に自分達で対応して、一酸化炭素を空間に充満させた。マクロキャノンは仕事に戻されて、私的に行動した者達は、自由開拓者の従者を暴民の正義に晒したとして罰せられた。

languages.text: Une maladie mystérieuse frappe le clan résidant dans les quartiers du macro-canon. Le mal se propage rapidement, provoquant d'insupportables crampes d'estomac et terrassant les victimes après plusieurs jours d'agonie. Avant que les officiers n'aient le temps de réagir, les clans voisins prennent les choses en main et purifient tout le quartier au monoxyde de carbone. Le macro-canon est remis en service et les redresseurs de torts sont punis pour avoir soumis les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à la vindicte populaire.
languages.original_text: A mysterious sickness struck the clan living in one of the macro-cannon chambers. The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighbouring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.

traits.locale_text: Une maladie mystérieuse frappe le clan résidant dans les quartiers du macro-canon. Le mal se propage rapidement, provoquant d'insupportables crampes d'estomac et terrassant les victimes après plusieurs jours d'agonie. Avant que les officiers n'aient le temps de réagir, les clans voisins prennent les choses en main et purifient tout le quartier au monoxyde de carbone. Le macro-canon est remis en service et les redresseurs de torts sont punis pour avoir soumis les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à la vindicte populaire.

languages.text: Eine mysteriöse Krankheit hat den Clan in einer der Makrokanonen-Kammern befallen. Die Infektion verbreitet sich rasant und führt zu unerträglichen Magenkrämpfen, die nach einigen qualvollen Tagen zum Tod führen. Bevor die Offiziere reagieren können, nehmen die benachbarten Clans die Dinge selbst in die Hand und fluten die Kammer mit Kohlenmonoxid. Die Makrokanone wurde wieder in Betrieb genommen und die Nachbarn wurden bestraft, weil sie Selbstjustiz an den Dienern {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} geübt haben.
languages.original_text: A mysterious sickness struck the clan living in one of the macro-cannon chambers. The disease quickly spread, causing the afflicted to writhe with unbearable stomach cramps and expire after several days of agony. Before the officers could react, the neighbouring clans took the issue into their own hands and flooded the chamber with carbon monoxide. The macro-cannon was put back into service and the vigilantes were punished for subjecting the Rogue Trader's servants to mob justice.
